name: Revel Rousers (itch)
description:
Revel Rousers is our action packed, physics, destruction game where you lead a mob of party animals through a city wreaking havoc and destroying everything in order to please The Party God with the most epic, awesome, dance party ever!  Grab as many people as you can before The Party God shows up!

Controls:

            W                                                        R                                                  SPACEBAR
        A  S  D

MOVEMENT                      RECALL DISCO BALL                        SPAWN UNIT
